sections.TOP: Pebble014580h1epdzr7cavxulx6c4hlsxai4qvxhj01200652014-03-28T14:35:16ZGreater good3347453/* See also */'''Pebble''' is an island in [[the Bite]], located north of [[the Fingers]] and east of the [[Three Sisters]].<ref>Season 2 Bluray: War of the Five Kings feature</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Pebble is the seat of House Pryor, sworn to [[the Eyrie]].
